headline.main: $1,000,000 PLEDGED FOR AID TO RUSSIA; Jewish Relief Group Council Offers to Raise, Possibly Double, Sum in 1943 GROWING NEED IS SEEN Lehman Says Advance of Reds Discloses New Demands for Help Behind Lines

lead_paragraph: A minimum of $1,000,000 for Russian War Relief during the year, "with the hope that this will be doubled," was pledged yesterday at the first anniversary conference of The Jewish Council for Russian War Relief, at the Hotel Commodore.
abstract: S on need for supporting Russian War Relief, Jewish Council sec conf
snippet: A minimum of $1,000,000 for Russian War Relief during the year, "with the hope that this will be doubled," was pledged yesterday at the first anniversary conference of The Jewish Council for Russian War Relief, at the Hotel Commodore....
